name: joshm1-claude-plugins
description: Personal collection of Claude Code plugins for web development, testing, and git workflows

plugins.name: python-dev
plugins.description: Python development tools: pytest testing agents (fix, runner), pyright strict type checking, and Python code smell auditing

plugins.name: typescript-dev
plugins.description: TypeScript development tools: quick post-edit type checking and linting to catch errors early

plugins.name: browser-testing
plugins.description: Browser automation and debugging with Playwright MCP for visual testing, UI debugging, and E2E test development

plugins.name: git-public
plugins.description: Safe git workflows for public repositories: secret scanning, semantic commits, and commit history security review

plugins.name: dev-utils
plugins.description: General development utilities: skill management, instruction compacting, MCP token tracking, and extension creation guide
